title: PM emphasizes just distribution of provincial funds by Sindh government
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 24 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan Thursday said that as the federal government ensures timely release of funds under National Finance Commission, (NFC) it was also essential that Sindh government made just distribution of provincial funds.
The prime minister, in a meeting with the parliamentarians of the Muttahida Qaumi Movement, said the government was taking all out measures to resolve the issue faced by the people of Karachi.
Federal Planning Minister Asad Umar, MNA Khalid Maqbool Siddiqui and Senator Faisal Sabzwari attended the meeting wherein the prime minister was updated on the progress in ongoing development projects in Karachi.
The prime minister said the early completion of federal government projects in Karachi and early launch of newly announced works there were among governmentâ€™s priorities.
